entry.title: I Built A Home (For You, For Me)
entry.summary:
Author: Gingerific

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,061Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: It started with ”You’re allowed to take up space, Buck.”-Buck spent so much of his life existing as a paradox, where he was too much but never enough. Always searching for that place where he was good enough as he was, where he didn’t have to shrink himself or dim his light.Through a couple of therapy sessions, some realizations are made, truths learned, and views changed.
